General.Name: Boutique Newcity Public Company Limited
General.Description: Boutique Newcity Public Company Limited, manufactures and distributes women's fashion products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Domestic Retail, Online, Foreign Retail, and Corporate Sales. The company offers its products under the Uniform Specializer, GSP, C&D, Jousse, LOF-FI-CIEL, FLIP, and Guy Laroche brands. It also operates A'MAZE, a multi-brand store. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Pravara  Ekaraphanich
1.Title: Chairman of the Exec. Board, MD & Exec. Director
